Title: Snouty Sabotage
Description:
You need good distraction to get earthen out. I need Glumtooth Gang stopped. Have perfect thing for both.

Some fool mix Cinderbrew with candle wax in The Warrens. Candles burn normal at first, then boom. Big boom. Place around camp. Explosions good distraction for escape.

While you at it, loosen some bug leashes. Let Glumtooth Gang see how scary bugs are.
ObjectivesText: Place Cinder-flash Candles and loosen bug leashes.
CompletionText: Boss Whiskerlash regret day he help turn kobolds to war.
RewardText: Perfect, you have good distraction when time come. Can't wait.
